nodes.text: Undead warriors were created through the use of the Tsaiwinokka Hoyakut spell, devised by the Sith Lord Dathka Graush.

Undead warriors were extremely aggressive in nature and were a terrifying sight to behold. Also called reanimated dead, they rose in legions to consume the enemies of their masters. The condition of the spell they were kept under could be transferred to a victim through biting.
Undead warriors had no preference of weapons, but inflicted death and injury through any means possible.
